rules.description: Alacritty pane navigation with option + num
Use control for close, open new tab, reload, focus on url bar in Firefox+
Use Option + Number to Switch Tabs in Chrome, Brave & Firefox
option to move by word horizontally
option+u to Line start, cmd+i to Line end
cmd+o to page up, cmd+p to page down
Use option+d to Ctrl+A in Alacritty for TMUX
